类 BlockchainUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Blockchain utility, include address check, blockId check, amount calculate.

      • isValidRevision

        public static boolean isValidRevision(java.lang.String revision)
        Check if the block revision is valid.
        参数:
        revision - block revision string.
        返回:
        boolean value.

      • isAddress

        public static boolean isAddress(java.lang.String address)
        Check if the address hex string is valid.
        参数:
        address - address hex string start with "0x", "VX" or without prefix string.
        返回:
        boolean value.

        参数:
        hexId - is block Id or txId.
        返回:
        true or false.

      • amount

        public static java.math.BigDecimal amount(java.lang.String hexString,
                                          int precision,
                                          int scale)
        get amount of BigDecimal value.
        参数:
        hexString - hex string of the amount.
        precision - the precision of the amount, with is 18 by default
        scale - the remain digits numbers of fractional part
        返回:
        the amount value which can show to the end user.

      • byteArrayAmount

        public static byte[] byteArrayAmount(java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                     int precision)
        Convert big decimal to byte array.
        参数:
        amount - amount BigDecimal
        precision - must >= 0
        返回:
        byte array.

      • generateTransactionId

        public static java.lang.String generateTransactionId(RawTransaction rawTransaction,
                                                     Address signer)
        Generate transaction id.
        参数:
        rawTransaction - RawTransaction
        signer - Address
        返回:
        a hex string id with "0x"
